QuestData.Title: To the Summit
QuestData.Description: We are staging a relief effort at Westreach Summit for all of Thousand Needles. Shyn will lend you my wind rider to safely get you there. Speak with Kanati Greycloud when you land.$B$BYou must go quickly if lives are to be saved!
QuestData.LogDescription: Borrow a wind rider from Shyn and speak with Kanati Greycloud at Westreach Summit in Thousand Needles.
